summary: 2002 FLEETWOOD AMERICAN EAGLE 40' MOTOR COACH.  AIR BRAKE HOLDING TANK. NOTIFIED SPARTAN CHASSIS MANUFACTURE AND FLEETWOOD, BOTH SAY "IT'S OUT OF WARRANTY".  THIS CONDITION UNDER THE RIGHT CIRCUMSTANCES CAN CAUSE COMPLETE LOSS OF BRAKING!!  MANUFACTURE MUST BE NOTIFIED TO RECALL "ALL" TANKS TO INSPECT AND DETERMIN EMINENT DANGER OF. THANKS FOR YOUR IMMEDIATE CALL TO ACTION. *TR
